018
019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import io.kubernetes.client.Discovery;
022import io.kubernetes.client.apimachinery.GroupVersionKind;
023import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiClient;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
026import io.kubernetes.client.util.Strings;
027import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.KubernetesApiResponse;
028import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
029import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
030import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
031import java.util.Optional;
032import java.util.function.Function;
033
034/**
035 * A stub for namespaced custom objects.
036 */
037@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
038public class K8sObjectStub {
039    private final DynamicKubernetesApi api;
040    private final String group;
041    private final String version;
042    private final String namespace;
043    private final String plural;
044    private final String name;
045
046    /**
047     * Instantiates a new namespaced custom object stub.
048     *
049     * @param group the group
050     * @param version the version
051     * @param namespace the namespace
052     * @param plural the plural
053     * @param name the name
054     */
055    protected K8sObjectStub(ApiClient client, String group,
056            String version, String namespace, String plural, String name) {
057        this.group = group;
058        this.version = version;
059        this.namespace = namespace;
060        this.plural = plural;
061        this.name = name;
062        api = new DynamicKubernetesApi(group, version, plural, client);
063    }
064
065    /**
066     * Gets the group.
067     *
068     * @return the group
069     */
070    public String group() {
071        return group;
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * Gets the version.
076     *
077     * @return the version
078     */
079    public String version() {
080        return version;
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * Gets the namespace.
085     *
086     * @return the namespace
087     */
088    public String namespace() {
089        return namespace;
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * Gets the plural.
094     *
095     * @return the plural
096     */
097    public String plural() {
098        return plural;
099    }
100
101    /**
102     * Gets the name.
103     *
104     * @return the name
105     */
106    public String name() {
107        return name;
108    }
109
110    /**
111     * Get a namespaced custom object stub. If the version in parameter
112     * `gvk` is an empty string, the stub refers to the first object with
113     * matching group and kind. 
114     *
115     * @param client the client
116     * @param gvk the group, version and kind
117     * @param namespace the namespace
118     * @param name the name
119     * @return the dynamic kubernetes api
120     * @throws ApiException the api exception
121     */
122    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
123        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI" })
124    public static Optional<K8sObjectStub>
125            get(ApiClient client, GroupVersionKind gvk,
126                    String namespace, String name) throws ApiException {
127        var group = gvk.getGroup();
128        var kind = gvk.getKind();
129        var version = gvk.getVersion();
130        var apiMatch = new Discovery(client).findAll().stream()
131            .filter(r -> r.getGroup().equals(group) && r.getKind().equals(kind)
132                && (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(version)
133                    || r.getVersions().contains(version)))
134            .findFirst();
135        if (apiMatch.isEmpty()) {
136            return Optional.empty();
137        }
138        var apiRes = apiMatch.get();
139        var finalVersion = Strings.isNullOrEmpty(version)
140            ? apiRes.getVersions().get(0)
141            : version;
142        return Optional
143            .of(new K8sObjectStub(client, group, finalVersion,
144                namespace, apiRes.getResourcePlural(), name));
145    }
146
147    /**
148     * Retrieves and returns the current state of the object.
149     *
150     * @return the dynamic kubernetes object
151     * @throws ApiException the api exception
152     */
153    public DynamicKubernetesObject state() throws ApiException {
154        var response = api.get(namespace, name).throwsApiException();
155        return response.getObject();
156    }
157
158    /**
159     * Updates the object's status.
160     *
161     * @param object the current state of the object (passed to `status`)
162     * @param status function that returns the new status
163     * @return the kubernetes api response
164     * @throws ApiException the api exception
165     */
166    public KubernetesApiResponse<DynamicKubernetesObject>
167            updateStatus(DynamicKubernetesObject object,
168                    Function<DynamicKubernetesObject, Object> status)
169                    throws ApiException {
170        return api.updateStatus(object, status).throwsApiException();
171    }
172
173    /**
174     * Updates the status.
175     *
176     * @param status the status
177     * @return the kubernetes api response
178     * @throws ApiException the api exception
179     */
180    public KubernetesApiResponse<DynamicKubernetesObject>
181            updateStatus(Function<DynamicKubernetesObject, Object> status)
182                    throws ApiException {
183        return updateStatus(state(), status);
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * Patch the object.
188     *
189     * @param patchType the patch type
190     * @param patch the patch
191     * @param options the options
192     * @return the kubernetes api response
193     * @throws ApiException the api exception
194     */
195    public KubernetesApiResponse<DynamicKubernetesObject> patch(
196            String patchType, V1Patch patch, PatchOptions options)
197            throws ApiException {
198        return api.patch(namespace, name, patchType, patch, options)
199            .throwsApiException();
200    }
201
202    /**
203     * Patch the object using default options.
204     *
205     * @param patchType the patch type
206     * @param patch the patch
207     * @return the kubernetes api response
208     * @throws ApiException the api exception
209     */
210    public KubernetesApiResponse<DynamicKubernetesObject>
211            patch(String patchType, V1Patch patch) throws ApiException {
212        PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
213        return patch(patchType, patch, opts);
214    }
215}
